Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Atlanta in 1971...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1971, off Jim Maloney (CIN)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Cincinnati on 4/8/1971...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/1971, off Nelson Briles (PIT)...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/22/1973, hitting .417 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 5/3/1973...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/27/1973, hitting .414 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1976, hitting .519 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1976, hitting .411 with 3 HR, 29 RBI...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1977, hitting .355 with 3 HR, 14 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 4/22/1978...
Injured on 9/26/1978 with a Broken Wrist, out for 10-11 weeks...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/18/1979 with a Torn Hip Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 9/3/1979 with a Spasms Back, out for 5 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1980, hitting .409 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1980, hitting .464 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1980, hitting .374 with 4 HR, 18 RBI...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Traded from Atlanta to Minnesota on 7/7/1980 (Going to ATL: P D. Righetti, P J. Verhoeven, P R. Jackson, RF C. Maldonado, CF A. Otis. Going to MIN: CF T. Wakamatsu)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1980, hitting .416 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1980, hitting .517 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/11/1981, off Steve Grilli (CLE)...
Injured on 9/2/1981 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/22/1981 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1982...
Hit for the cycle against California on 5/7/1983...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against California on 5/7/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1983, hitting .483 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1983, hitting .414 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 4/30/1984 with a Torn Rib Cage Muscle, out for 10 weeks...
